title: The support of functions
content: In this section, the support of functions is defined and corresponding theorems are provided. Since basic properties (see ~ suppval ) are based on the Axiom of Union (usage of ~ dmexg ), these definition and theorems cannot be provided earlier. Until April 2019, the support of a function was represented by the expression ` ( ``' R " ( _V \ { Z } ) ) ` (see ~ suppimacnv ). The theorems which are based on this representation and which are provided in previous sections could be moved into this section to have all related theorems in one section, although they do not depend on the Axiom of Union. This was possible because they are not used before. The current theorems differ from the original ones by requiring that the classes representing the "function" (or its "domain") and the "zero element" are sets. Actually, this does not cause any problem (until now).

blocks.name: csupp
blocks.content: Extend class definition to include the support of functions.
blocks.origin: const class csupp { supp }

blocks.name: diff.csupp.s
diff.csupp.c
diff.csupp.w
df-supp
blocks.content: Define the support of a function against a "zero" value. According to Wikipedia ("Support (mathematics)", 31-Mar-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Support_(mathematics) ) "In mathematics, the support of a real-valued function f is the subset of the domain containing those elements which are not mapped to zero." and "The notion of support also extends in a natural way to functions taking values in more general sets than R [the real numbers] and to other objects.". The following definition allows for such extensions, being applicable for any sets (which usually are functions) and any element (even not necessarily from the range of the function) regarded as "zero". (Contributed by AV, 31-Mar-2019.) (Revised by AV, 6-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: suppval
blocks.content: The value of the operation constructing the support of a function. (Contributed by AV, 31-Mar-2019.) (Revised by AV, 6-Apr-2019.)

thm suppval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c2), crab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, csupp, c2, crab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2))), universe, universe, crab(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), wne(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(hs1)))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(csupp, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, crab(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), wne(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(hs1)))))))
  df-supp(hs0, hs1, s0)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(crab(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), wne(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(hs1)))), crab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2)))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wne(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(hs1))), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0)))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  neeq12d(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(hs1)), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cima(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), cima(c0, csn(cv(s0)))))
  imaeq1(cv(hs0), c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(csn(cv(hs1)), csn(c2)))
  sneq(cv(hs1), c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, c3)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2))), universe), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  dmexg(c0, c1)
  rabexg(s0, cdm(c0), universe, wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm suppval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[supp]c2)= { s0 ‚àà dom(c0)|(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 } })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, csupp, c2, { s0 ‚àà dom(c0)|(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 } }, universe, universe, { s0 ‚àà dom(hs0)|(hs0 " { s0 })‚â† { hs1 } }, universe, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), supp =(hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà dom(hs0)|(hs0 " { s0 })‚â† { hs1 } }))
  df-supp(hs0, hs1, s0)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), { s0 ‚àà dom(hs0)|(hs0 " { s0 })‚â† { hs1 } } = { s0 ‚àà dom(c0)|(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 } })
  rabeqbidv(s0, dom(hs0), dom(c0), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), (hs0 " { s0 })‚â† { hs1 }, (c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 })
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, dom(hs0)= dom(c0))
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  neeq12d((hs0 " { s0 }), { hs1 }, (c0 " { s0 }), { c2 }, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (hs0 " { s0 })=(c0 " { s0 }))
  imaeq1(hs0, c0, { s0 })
  adantl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, { hs1 } = { c2 })
  sneq(hs1, c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c2, c3)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), { s0 ‚àà dom(c0)|(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 } } ‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, dom(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(c0, c1)
  rabexg(s0, dom(c0), universe, (c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 })
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà dom(c0)|(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 } })
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ‚àà dom(c0)|(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 } })
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: supp0prc
blocks.content: The support of a class is empty if either the class or the "zero" is a proper class. . (Contributed by AV, 28-May-2019.)

blocks.name: suppvalbr
blocks.content: The value of the operation constructing the support of a function expressed by binary relations. (Contributed by AV, 7-Apr-2019.)

thm suppvalbr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c2), cab(s0, wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wne(cv(s1), c2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, csupp, c2), cab(s0, wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wne(cv(s1), c2))))), crab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2))), cab(s0, wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2)))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  suppval(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2))), cab(s0, wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2))))))))
  eqtri(crab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2))), cab(s0, wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2)))))), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2)))))
  df-rab(s0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2)))
  abbii(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2))), wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2))))))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2)), wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2)))))
  eldm(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  vex(s0)
  3bitr4i(wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2)), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), wne(cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), csn(c2)), wne(cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2))))
  neeq2i(cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), csn(c2), cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  df-sn(s1, c2)
  neeq1i(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c2), cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  elv(s0, wceq(cima(c0, csn(cv(s0))), cab(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  imasng(s1, cv(s0), universe, c0)
  nabbi(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cab(s0, wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2)))))), cab(s0, wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wne(cv(s1), c2)))))))
  abbii(s0, wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2))))), wa(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wne(cv(s1), c2)))))
  anbi2i(wex(s1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2)))), wex(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wne(cv(s1), c2))))
  exbii(s1, wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2))), wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wne(cv(s1), c2)))
  bibi2i(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wne(cv(s1), c2))
  bicomi(wn(wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wne(cv(s1), c2))
  df-ne(cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm suppvalbr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[supp]c2)= { s0 |(‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî s1 ‚â† c2)))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0[supp]c2), { s0 |(‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî s1 ‚â† c2)))}, { s0 ‚àà dom(c0)|(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 } }, { s0 |(‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2)))}, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  suppval(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), { s0 ‚àà dom(c0)|(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 } } = { s0 |(‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2)))})
  eqtri({ s0 ‚àà dom(c0)|(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 } }, { s0 |(‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2)))}, { s0 |(s0 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 })})
  df-rab(s0, dom(c0), (c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 })
  abbii(s0, (s0 ‚àà dom(c0)‚àß(c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 }), (‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2))))
  anbi12i(s0 ‚àà dom(c0), (c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 }, ‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1), ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2)))
  eldm(s1, s0, c0)
  vex(s0)
  3bitr4i((c0 " { s0 })‚â† { c2 }, ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2)), { s1 | s0[c0]s1 } ‚â† { c2 }, { s1 | s0[c0]s1 } ‚â† { s1 | s1 = c2 })
  neeq2i({ s1 | s0[c0]s1 }, { c2 }, { s1 | s1 = c2 })
  df-sn(s1, c2)
  neeq1i((c0 " { s0 }), { c2 }, { s1 | s0[c0]s1 })
  elv(s0, (c0 " { s0 })= { s1 | s0[c0]s1 })
  imasng(s1, s0, universe, c0)
  nabbi(s1, s0[c0]s1, s1 = c2)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), { s0 |(‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2)))} = { s0 |(‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî s1 ‚â† c2)))})
  abbii(s0, (‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2))), (‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1)‚àß ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî s1 ‚â† c2))))
  anbi2i(‚àÉ(s1, s0[c0]s1), ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2)), ‚àÉ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî s1 ‚â† c2)))
  exbii(s1, (s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî ¬¨ s1 = c2), (s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî s1 ‚â† c2))
  bibi2i(s0[c0]s1, ¬¨ s1 = c2, s1 ‚â† c2)
  bicomi(¬¨ s1 = c2, s1 ‚â† c2)
  df-ne(s1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: supp0
blocks.content: The support of the empty set is the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 12-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm supp0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(emptycls, csupp, c0), emptycls))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(emptycls, csupp, c0), emptycls, crab(hs0, cdm(emptycls), wne(cima(emptycls, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c0))), crab(hs0, emptycls, wne(cima(emptycls, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(emptycls, csupp, c0), crab(hs0, cdm(emptycls), wne(cima(emptycls, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c0)))), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  suppval(hs0, emptycls, universe, c0, c1)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(crab(hs0, cdm(emptycls), wne(cima(emptycls, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c0))), crab(hs0, emptycls, wne(cima(emptycls, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c0)))), wceq(cdm(emptycls), emptycls))
  dm0()
  rabeq(hs0, cdm(emptycls), emptycls, wne(cima(emptycls, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c0)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(crab(hs0, emptycls, wne(cima(emptycls, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c0))), emptycls))
  rab0(hs0, wne(cima(emptycls, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(emptycls))
}

thm cnvimadfsn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  exbii(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), ccnv(c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wne(cv(s1), c1)))

  eximi(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)))
  pm5.1(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cab(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))))))
  cnvimadfsn(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  suppvalbr(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

thm suppimacnvss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))‚äÜ(c0[supp]c2))
} = {
  3sstr4d((`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), (c0[supp]c2), { hs0 | ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚â† c2))}, { hs0 |(‚àÉ(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)))}, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  ss2abdv(hs0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚â† c2)), (‚àÉ(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2))))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚â† c2))‚Üí(‚àÉ(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)))))
  jca(‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚â† c2)), ‚àÉ(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1), ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)))
  exsimpl(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1, hs1 ‚â† c2)
  eximi(hs1, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚â† c2), (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2))
  pm5.1(hs0[c0]hs1, hs1 ‚â† c2)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))= { hs0 | ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚â† c2))})
  cnvimadfsn(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)
  suppvalbr(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

thm suppimacnv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c0, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  3sstr4d(co(c0, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cab(hs0, wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))))), cab(hs0, wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  ss2abdv(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wa(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  imp(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  sylbi(wex(hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wi(wex(hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))), wex(hs3, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3))))
  cbvexvw(hs1, hs3, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)))
  breq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs3), cv(hs0), c0)
  exlimiv(hs3, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wi(wex(hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  com12(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wex(hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  exlimiv(hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  expcom(wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  pm2.61ine(cv(hs3), c2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(hs3), c2), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs3), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs3), c2, cv(hs0), c0)
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))), wne(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantld(wne(cv(hs1), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  pm2.43a(wne(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  ex(wne(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wne(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  syl(wa(wne(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wi(wne(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  bianir(wne(cv(hs1), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  ex(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  spcev(hs2, cv(hs1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))
  vex(hs1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))
  breq2(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0)
  neeq1(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), c2)
  pm2.43i(wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  sylbi(wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  nne(cv(hs1), c2)
  com13(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  imp(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))))
  com13(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  syl5bi(wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))), wb(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2))))
  notbi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))
  ex(wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wb(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))))
  syl(wa(wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wb(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  bianir(wn(wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  com13(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  syl6bi(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wi(wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  eqcoms(cv(hs1), c2, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  breq2(c2, cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c0)
  pm2.24(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  com12(wne(cv(hs3), c2), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  adantr(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)), wi(wne(cv(hs3), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  ex(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wne(cv(hs3), c2), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))
  spcev(hs2, cv(hs3), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wne(cv(hs3), c2)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))
  vex(hs3)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wne(cv(hs3), c2))
  breq2(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), cv(hs0), c0)
  neeq1(cv(hs2), cv(hs3), c2)
  suppvalbr(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cab(hs0, wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2))))))
  cnvimadfsn(hs0, hs2, c0, c2)
  suppimacnvss(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)))
  diff.hs3.w(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs3.w(wi(wex(hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2))), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wex(hs2, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wne(cv(hs2), c2)))))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wne(cv(hs1), c2)))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs3))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs3)), wne(cv(hs3), c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}

thm suppimacnv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0[supp]c2)=(`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 })))
} = {
  eqssd((c0[supp]c2), (`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  3sstr4d((c0[supp]c2), (`' c0 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), { hs0 |(‚àÉ(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)))}, { hs0 | ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))}, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  ss2abdv(hs0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (‚àÉ(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2))), ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), ((‚àÉ(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1)‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)))‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))))
  imp(‚àÉ(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1), ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)), ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))
  sylbi(‚àÉ(hs1, hs0[c0]hs1), (‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2))‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))), ‚àÉ(hs3, hs0[c0]hs3))
  cbvexvw(hs1, hs3, hs0[c0]hs1, hs0[c0]hs3)
  breq2(hs1, hs3, hs0, c0)
  exlimiv(hs3, hs0[c0]hs3, (‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2))‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))))
  com12(hs0[c0]hs3, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)), ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))
  exlimiv(hs1, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), (hs0[c0]hs3 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))))
  expcom((hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), hs0[c0]hs3, ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))
  pm2.61ine(hs3, c2, ((hs0[c0]hs3 ‚àß(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2))‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))))
  syl6bi(hs3 = c2, (hs0[c0]hs3 ‚àß(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)), ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)), (hs0[c0]c2 ‚àß(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)))
  anbi1d(hs3 = c2, hs0[c0]hs3, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), hs0[c0]c2)
  breq2(hs3, c2, hs0, c0)
  pm2.61i(((hs0[c0]c2 ‚àß(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2))‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))), hs1 ‚â† c2)
  adantld(hs1 ‚â† c2, hs0[c0]c2, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))
  pm2.43a(hs1 ‚â† c2, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))
  ex(hs1 ‚â† c2, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), (hs1 ‚â† c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))))
  syl((hs1 ‚â† c2 ‚àß(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2)), (hs1 ‚â† c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))), hs0[c0]hs1)
  bianir(hs1 ‚â† c2, hs0[c0]hs1)
  ex(hs0[c0]hs1, hs1 ‚â† c2, ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))
  spcev(hs2, hs1, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚â† c2), (hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))
  vex(hs1)
  anbi12d(hs2 = hs1, hs0[c0]hs2, hs2 ‚â† c2, hs0[c0]hs1, hs1 ‚â† c2)
  breq2(hs2, hs1, hs0, c0)
  neeq1(hs2, hs1, c2)
  pm2.43i(¬¨ hs1 ‚â† c2, ((hs0[c0]c2 ‚àß(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2))‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))))
  sylbi(¬¨ hs1 ‚â† c2, (¬¨ hs1 ‚â† c2 ‚Üí((hs0[c0]c2 ‚àß(hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2))‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))), hs1 = c2)
  nne(hs1, c2)

  imp(hs0[c0]c2, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), (¬¨ hs1 ‚â† c2 ‚Üí(hs1 = c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))))
  com13(hs0[c0]c2, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), ¬¨ hs1 ‚â† c2, (hs1 = c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))))
  syl5bi(¬¨ hs1 ‚â† c2, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), (hs0[c0]c2 ‚Üí(hs1 = c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))), (¬¨ hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî ¬¨ hs1 ‚â† c2))
  notbi(hs0[c0]hs1, hs1 ‚â† c2)
  ex(¬¨ hs1 ‚â† c2, (¬¨ hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî ¬¨ hs1 ‚â† c2), (hs0[c0]c2 ‚Üí(hs1 = c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))))

  breq2(c2, hs1, hs0, c0)

  adantr(hs0[c0]hs3, (hs0[c0]hs1 ‚Üî hs1 ‚â† c2), (hs3 ‚â† c2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))))
  ex(hs0[c0]hs3, hs3 ‚â† c2, ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2)))
  spcev(hs2, hs3, (hs0[c0]hs3 ‚àß hs3 ‚â† c2), (hs0[c0]hs2 ‚àß hs2 ‚â† c2))

blocks.name: frnsuppeq
blocks.content: Two ways of writing the support of a function with known codomain. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2015.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm frnsuppeq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wf(c4, c0, c5), wceq(co(c4, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))))))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wceq(co(c4, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2)))))
  eqtrd(co(c4, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5)), wceq(co(c4, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wcel(c4, universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wi(wf(c4, c0, c5), wcel(c4, universe)))
  expcom(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c4, c0, c5), wcel(c4, universe))
  fex(c4, c0, c5, c1)
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wf(c4, c0, c5))
  suppimacnv(c4, universe, c2, c3)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wceq(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2)))))
  syl5reqr(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), cima(ccnv(c4), cin(c5, cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wf(c4, c0, c5))
  imaeq2i(ccnv(c4), cin(c5, cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cdif(c5, csn(c2)))
  invdif(c5, csn(c2))
  eqtrd(cima(ccnv(c4), cin(c5, cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cin(cima(ccnv(c4), c5), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wf(c4, c0, c5))
  syl(wf(c4, c0, c5), wceq(cima(ccnv(c4), cin(c5, cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), cin(cima(ccnv(c4), c5), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2))))), wfun(c4))
  ffun(c4, c0, c5)
  inpreima(c4, c5, cdif(universe, csn(c2)))
  sylib(wf(c4, c0, c5), wceq(cin(cima(ccnv(c4), c5), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wss(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cima(ccnv(c4), c5)))
  syl5sseq(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cima(ccnv(c4), c5), cdm(c4), wf(c4, c0, c5))
  cnvimass(c4, cdif(universe, csn(c2)))
  eqtr4d(cdm(c4), cima(ccnv(c4), c5), c0, wf(c4, c0, c5))
  fdm(c4, c0, c5)
  fimacnv(c4, c0, c5)
  sseqin2(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cima(ccnv(c4), c5))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm frnsuppeq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí((c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5)‚Üí(c4[supp]c2)=(`' c4 "(c5 \ { c2 }))))
} = {
  ex((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5), (c4[supp]c2)=(`' c4 "(c5 \ { c2 })))
  eqtrd((c4[supp]c2), (`' c4 "(c5 \ { c2 })), (`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß(c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5)))
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß(c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5)), (c4[supp]c2)=(`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), c4 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà c3)
  imp((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5), c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, ((c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5)‚Üí c4 ‚àà ùïå))
  expcom(c0 ‚àà c1, (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5), c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  fex(c4, c0, c5, c1)
  simplr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5))
  suppimacnv(c4, universe, c2, c3)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5), (`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))=(`' c4 "(c5 \ { c2 })))
  syl5reqr((`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), (`' c4 "(c5 \ { c2 })), (`' c4 "(c5 ‚ãÇ(ùïå \ { c2 }))), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5))
  imaeq2i(`' c4, (c5 ‚ãÇ(ùïå \ { c2 })), (c5 \ { c2 }))
  invdif(c5, { c2 })
  eqtrd((`' c4 "(c5 ‚ãÇ(ùïå \ { c2 }))), (`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), ((`' c4 " c5)‚ãÇ(`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5))
  syl((c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5), (`' c4 "(c5 ‚ãÇ(ùïå \ { c2 })))=((`' c4 " c5)‚ãÇ(`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))), Fun(c4))
  ffun(c4, c0, c5)
  inpreima(c4, c5, (ùïå \ { c2 }))
  sylib((c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5), ((`' c4 " c5)‚ãÇ(`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 })))=(`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), (`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 }))‚äÜ(`' c4 " c5))
  syl5sseq((`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), (`' c4 " c5), dom(c4), (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5))
  cnvimass(c4, (ùïå \ { c2 }))
  eqtr4d(dom(c4), (`' c4 " c5), c0, (c4 : c0 ‚Üí c5))
  fdm(c4, c0, c5)
  fimacnv(c4, c0, c5)
  sseqin2((`' c4 "(ùïå \ { c2 })), (`' c4 " c5))
}

blocks.name: suppssdm
blocks.content: The support of a function is a subset of the function's domain. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppssdm(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), cdm(c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl6eqss(co(c0, csupp, c1), cdm(c0), crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  suppval(hs0, c0, universe, c1, universe)
  ssrab2(hs0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c1)))
  syl6eqss(co(c0, csupp, c1), cdm(c0), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  supp0prc(c0, c1)
  0ss(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
}

  syl6eqss((c0[supp]c1), dom(c0), emptycls, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  supp0prc(c0, c1)

  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(crab(hs0, cdm(c6), wne(cima(c6, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c4))), crab(hs0, csn(c0), wne(cima(c6, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c4)))), wceq(cdm(c6), csn(c0)))

  dmeqd(c6, csn(cop(c0, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(c6, csn(cop(c0, c2))))

blocks.name: snopsuppss
blocks.content: The support of a singleton containing an ordered pair is a subset of the singleton containing the first element of the ordered pair, i.e. it is empty or the singleton itself. (Contributed by AV, 19-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: fvn0elsupp
blocks.content: If the function value for a given argument is not empty, the argument belongs to the support of the function with the empty set as zero. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jul-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wfn(c3, c0), wne(cfv(c3, c2), emptycls))

blocks.name: suppun
blocks.content: The support of a class/function is a subset of the support of the union of this class/function with another class/function. (Contributed by AV, 4-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(cun(c0, c2), csupp, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(cun(c0, c2), csupp, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(cun(c0, c2), csupp, c1)))
  3sstr4d(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(cun(c0, c2), csupp, c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), cima(ccnv(cun(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), cima(ccnv(cun(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))))
  sseqtr4i(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), cima(ccnv(cun(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), cun(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))))
  ssun1(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c1))))
  eqtri(cima(ccnv(cun(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), cun(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), cima(ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))), cima(cun(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c1))))
  imaeq1i(ccnv(cun(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c1)), cun(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c2)))
  cnvun(c0, c2)
  imaundir(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c2), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0, wceq(co(c0, csupp, c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))))
  suppimacnv(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0), wceq(co(cun(c0, c2), csupp, c1), cima(ccnv(cun(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))), wcel(cun(c0, c2), universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0, wcel(cun(c0, c2), universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cun(c0, c2), universe))
  unexg(c0, universe, c2, c3)
  simplr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), w0)
  suppimacnv(cun(c0, c2), universe, c1, universe)
  a1d(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(cun(c0, c2), csupp, c1)))
  syl6eqss(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(cun(c0, c2), csupp, c1), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  supp0prc(c0, c1)
  0ss(co(cun(c0, c2), csupp, c1))
}

  ssrdv(hs1, cdif(crab(hs0, cdm(c0), wne(cima(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c2))), crab(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, c4)), wne(cima(cres(c0, c4), csn(cv(hs0))), csn(c2)))), cdif(cdm(c0), c4), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))

  sylan(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, ((c0 |` c4)[supp]c2)= { hs0 ‚àà dom((c0 |` c4))|((c0 |` c4)" { hs0 })‚â† { c2 } }, (c0 |` c4)‚àà ùïå)

  eldif(cv(s0), c3, c0)
  adantll(wcel(c2, universe), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c2, universe), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c2))))))
  syl6bir(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c1, c2), wn(wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wcel(c1, csn(c2)))
  elsn2g(c2, universe, c1)

blocks.name: suppfnss
blocks.content: The support of a function which has the same zero values (in its domain) as another function is a subset of the support of this other function. (Contributed by AV, 30-Apr-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 6-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppfnss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c3)), w3a(wss(c1, c3), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c6))), wi(wral(s0, c1, wi(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c5))), wss(co(c0, csupp, c5), co(c2, csupp, c5))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)

blocks.name: funsssuppss
blocks.content: The support of a function which is a subset of another function is a subset of the support of this other function. (Contributed by AV, 27-Jul-2019.)

} = {

thm funsssuppss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[supp]c3)‚äÜ(c0[supp]c3))
} = {
  pm2.61i(((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[supp]c3)‚äÜ(c0[supp]c3)), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  expcom(c3 ‚àà ùïå, (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), (c1[supp]c3)‚äÜ(c0[supp]c3))
  sylc(((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), (c1[supp]c3)‚äÜ(c0[supp]c3), ((c1[Fn]dom(c1)‚àß c0[Fn]dom(c0))‚àß(dom(c1)‚äÜ dom(c0)‚àß dom(c0)‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà dom(c1),((c0 ` hs0)= c3 ‚Üí(c1 ` hs0)= c3)))
  jca(((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), (c1[Fn]dom(c1)‚àß c0[Fn]dom(c0)), (dom(c1)‚äÜ dom(c0)‚àß dom(c0)‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå))
  adantr((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà ùïå, (c1[Fn]dom(c1)‚àß c0[Fn]dom(c0)))
  3adant3(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚àà c2, (c1[Fn]dom(c1)‚àß c0[Fn]dom(c0)))
  jca((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0), c1[Fn]dom(c1), c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  funfnd(c1, (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0))
  impcom(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ c0, Fun(c1))
  funss(c1, c0)
  adantr(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ c0, c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  biimpi(Fun(c0), c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  funfn(c0)
  3jca(((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), dom(c1)‚äÜ dom(c0), dom(c0)‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantr((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà ùïå, dom(c1)‚äÜ dom(c0))
  3ad2ant2(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚àà c2, dom(c1)‚äÜ dom(c0))
  dmss(c1, c0)
  adantr((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  3ad2ant3(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚àà c2, dom(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(c0, c2)
  simpr((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantr((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà dom(c1),((c0 ` hs0)= c3 ‚Üí(c1 ` hs0)= c3)))
  3adant3(Fun(c0), c1 ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà dom(c1),((c0 ` hs0)= c3 ‚Üí(c1 ` hs0)= c3)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, dom(c1), (Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0), ((c0 ` hs0)= c3 ‚Üí(c1 ` hs0)= c3))

  syl(¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå, (c0[supp]c3)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå))
  con3i(c3 ‚àà ùïå, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå)

  diff.hs0.w((Fun(c0)‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c0))

blocks.content: Two ways to express restriction of a support set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Feb-2015.) (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)

thm fnsuppeq0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(co(c0, csupp, c3), emptycls), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c3))), wceq(cres(c0, c1), cxp(c1, csn(c3))))

  3ad2ant1(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wfn(c0, cun(emptycls, c1)))
  biimpi(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c0, cun(emptycls, c1)))
  fneq2i(c0, c1, cun(emptycls, c1))
  eqtr3i(c1, cun(emptycls, c1), cun(c1, emptycls))
  un0(c1)
  uncom(c1, emptycls)
  3adant3(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c0, universe))
  fnex(c0, c1, c2)
  simp3(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4))

  syl2an2((c0 √ó { c1 })‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå, { c1 } ‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 √ó { c1 })‚àà ùïå)
  snnzg(c1, universe)
  simpl((c0 √ó { c1 })‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  xpexcnv({ c1 }, c0)
  simpr((c0 √ó { c1 })‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fnsuppeq0((c0 √ó { c1 }), c0, universe, c1, universe)
  supp0prc((c0 √ó { c1 }), c1)
}

blocks.name: suppss
blocks.content: Show that the support of a function is contained in a set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), c2)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), c2))
  ssrdv(s0, co(c0, csupp, c1), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, csupp, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wne(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0), wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, csupp, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wne(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1))), wfn(c0, c3), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0, wfn(c0, c3))
  ffnd(c0, c3, c4, w0)
  impcom(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0, wcel(c3, universe))
  3syl(w0, wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(c3, universe)), wf(c0, c3, c4), wceq(cdm(c0), c3))
  fdm(c0, c3, c4)
  syl5ibr(wceq(cdm(c0), c3), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cdm(c0), universe))
  dmexg(c0, universe)
  eqcoms(cdm(c0), c3, wb(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(cdm(c0), universe)))
  eleq1(c3, cdm(c0), universe)
  simplr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), w0)
  elsuppfn(c0, c3, universe, c1, universe, cv(s0))
  expimpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wne(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  necon1ad(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  expr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1))
  sylan2br(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, c2)))
  eldif(cv(s0), c3, c2)
  adantll(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1))
  a1d(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c1), c2))
  syl6eqss(co(c0, csupp, c1), c2, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  supp0prc(c0, c1)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, csupp, c1)
  diff.csupp.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm suppss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[supp]c1)‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c3 ‚Üí c4))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c3 \ c2))‚Üí(c0 ` s0)= c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i((w0 ‚Üí(c0[supp]c1)‚äÜ c2), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  ex((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), w0, (c0[supp]c1)‚äÜ c2)
  ssrdv(s0, (c0[supp]c1), c2, ((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0))
  sylbid(((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0), s0 ‚àà(c0[supp]c1), s0 ‚àà c2, (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c0 ` s0)‚â† c1))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0), (s0 ‚àà(c0[supp]c1)‚Üî(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c0 ` s0)‚â† c1)), c0[Fn]c3, c3 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), w0, c0[Fn]c3)
  ffnd(c0, c3, c4, w0)
  impcom((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), w0, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  3syl(w0, ((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)‚Üí c3 ‚àà ùïå), (c0 : c3 ‚Üí c4), dom(c0)= c3)
  fdm(c0, c3, c4)
  syl5ibr(dom(c0)= c3, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), c3 ‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(c0, universe)
  eqcoms(dom(c0), c3, (c3 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üî dom(c0)‚àà ùïå))
  eleq1(c3, dom(c0), universe)
  simplr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå, w0)
  elsuppfn(c0, c3, universe, c1, universe, s0)
  expimpd(((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0), s0 ‚àà c3, (c0 ` s0)‚â† c1, s0 ‚àà c2)
  necon1ad((c0 ` s0), c1, (((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0)‚àß s0 ‚àà c3), s0 ‚àà c2)
  expr(((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0), s0 ‚àà c3, ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c2, (c0 ` s0)= c1)
  sylan2br(((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0), (s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c2), (c0 ` s0)= c1, s0 ‚àà(c3 \ c2))
  eldif(s0, c3, c2)
  adantll((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), w0, s0 ‚àà(c3 \ c2), (c0 ` s0)= c1)
  a1d(¬¨(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), w0, (c0[supp]c1)‚äÜ c2)
  syl6eqss((c0[supp]c1), c2, emptycls, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  supp0prc(c0, c1)
  0ss(c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, csupp, c1)
  diff.csupp.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: suppssr
blocks.content: A function is zero outside its support. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppssr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdif(c1, c2))), wceq(cfv(c3, c0), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c3, csupp, c4), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c7))
} = {
  sylan2b(w0, wcel(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c0), c4), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c2))))
  eldif(c0, c1, c2)
  impr(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c0), c4))
  necon1bd(cfv(c3, c0), c4, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, c2))
  syl5bir(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4))))
  mpbiran(wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), universe))
  expdimp(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wcel(c0, c2))
  sylbird(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, co(c3, csupp, c4)))
  bitrd(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, csupp, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4)))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c3, csupp, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4))), wfn(c3, c1), wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c4, c7))
  ffnd(c3, c1, c5, w0)
  elsuppfn(c3, c1, c6, c4, c7, c0)
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4))))
  syl6bbr(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, c0), universe), wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4)))
  mp1i(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, c0), universe), wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4))), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), universe))
  fvex(c3, c0)
  ibar(wcel(cfv(c3, c0), universe), wne(cfv(c3, c0), c4))
  eldifsn(cfv(c3, c0), universe, c4)
  sseld(c0, co(c3, csupp, c4), c2, w0)
}

thm suppssr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà(c1 \ c2))‚Üí(c3 ` c0)= c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c3 : c1 ‚Üí c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c3[supp]c4)‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c7)
} = {
  sylan2b(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1 \ c2), (c3 ` c0)= c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c2))
  eldif(c0, c1, c2)
  impr(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` c0)= c4)
  necon1bd((c3 ` c0), c4, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), c0 ‚àà c2)
  syl5bir((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), (c3 ` c0)‚â† c4, c0 ‚àà c2, (c3 ` c0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c4 }))
  mpbiran((c3 ` c0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c4 }), (c3 ` c0)‚â† c4, (c3 ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  expdimp(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c3 ` c0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c4 }), c0 ‚àà c2)
  sylbird(w0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` c0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c4 })), c0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà(c3[supp]c4))
  bitrd(w0, c0 ‚àà(c3[supp]c4), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` c0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c4 })), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` c0)‚â† c4))
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 ‚àà(c3[supp]c4)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c3 ` c0)‚â† c4)), c3[Fn]c1, c1 ‚àà c6, c4 ‚àà c7)
  ffnd(c3, c1, c5, w0)
  elsuppfn(c3, c1, c6, c4, c7, c0)
  pm5.32da(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c3 ` c0)‚â† c4, (c3 ` c0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c4 }))
  syl6bbr((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), (c3 ` c0)‚â† c4, (c3 ` c0)‚àà(ùïå \ { c4 }), ((c3 ` c0)‚àà ùïå ‚àß(c3 ` c0)‚â† c4))
  mp1i((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1), ((c3 ` c0)‚â† c4 ‚Üî((c3 ` c0)‚àà ùïå ‚àß(c3 ` c0)‚â† c4)), (c3 ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(c3, c0)
  ibar((c3 ` c0)‚àà ùïå, (c3 ` c0)‚â† c4)
  eldifsn((c3 ` c0), universe, c4)
  sseld(c0, (c3[supp]c4), c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: suppssov1
blocks.content: Formula building theorem for support restrictions: operator with left annihilator. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppssov1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), csupp, c4), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c6), c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c7)), wceq(co(c6, c2, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c9))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), csupp, c4), c5)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), csupp, c4), c5))
  sstrd(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), csupp, c4), c5, co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c6), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0))
  3sstr4d(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), csupp, c4), co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c6), crab(s0, c0, wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c6)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0))
  ss2rabdv(s0, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0), wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c6))))
  ex(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c6))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), cdif(universe, csn(c4)))), wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c6))), wcel(c1, universe), wne(c1, c6))
  adantr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wcel(c1, universe))
  adantll(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  elexd(c1, c8, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  impel(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(co(c1, c2, c3), cdif(universe, csn(c4))), wne(c1, c6), wne(co(c1, c2, c3), c4))
  necon3d(co(c1, c2, c3), c4, c1, c6, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c6), wceq(co(c1, c2, c3), c4), wceq(co(c6, c2, c3), c4))
  rspcdva(s1, c3, c7, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(c6, c2, c3), c4), wceq(co(c6, c2, cv(s1)), c4))
  eqeq1d(co(c6, c2, cv(s1)), c4, co(c6, c2, c3), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c3, c6, c2)
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c7, wceq(co(c6, c2, cv(s1)), c4)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0, wral(s1, c7, wceq(co(c6, c2, cv(s1)), c4)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c7, w0, wceq(co(c6, c2, cv(s1)), c4))
  adantll(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, c7))
  eqeq1d(co(c1, c2, c3), c4, co(c6, c2, c3), wceq(c1, c6))
  oveq1(c1, c6, c2, c3)
  eldifsni(co(c1, c2, c3), universe, c4)
  eldifsn(c1, universe, c6)
  mptsuppdifd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), c4, c0, co(c1, c2, c3), universe, universe, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe), w0)
  mptsuppdifd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c6, c0, c1, universe, c9, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), w0))

  a1d(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe))), w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), csupp, c4), c5))
  syl6eqss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), csupp, c4), c5, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe))))
  sylnbi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), wceq(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), csupp, c4), emptycls), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), universe), wcel(c4, universe)))

blocks.name: suppssof1
blocks.content: Formula building theorem for support restrictions: vector operation with left annihilator. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppssof1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), csupp, c3), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, c5), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6)), wceq(co(c5, c1, cv(s0)), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c7, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c7, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c10))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqsstrd(co(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), csupp, c3), c4, co(cmpt(hs0, c7, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), csupp, c3), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), csupp, c3, cmpt(hs0, c7, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  offval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, c7, c9, c9, w0)
  ffnd(c0, c7, c8, w0)
  ffnd(c2, c7, c6, w0)
  inidm(c7)
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  suppssov1(hs0, s0, c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, c4, c5, c6, universe, c10, w0)
  eqsstr3d(co(cmpt(hs0, c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), csupp, c5), c4, co(c0, csupp, c5), w0)
  oveq1d(c0, csupp, c5, cmpt(hs0, c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c0, c7, c8, w0)
  fvexd(c0, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c7)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c7, c2, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[oF(c1)]c2)[supp]c3)‚äÜ c4)

  eqidd((c2 ` hs0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c7))

  oveq1d(c0, csupp, c5, (hs0 ‚àà c7 ‚Ü¶(c0 ` hs0)), w0)

blocks.name: suppss2
blocks.content: Show that the support of a function is contained in a set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), c3)), wcel(c2, universe))
  ex(wcel(c2, universe), w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), c3))
  eqsstrd(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), c3, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wa(wcel(c2, universe), w0))
  mptsuppdifd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, c0, c1, c4, universe, wa(wcel(c2, universe), w0))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c2, universe), w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  simpl(wcel(c2, universe), w0)
  rabssdv(s0, c0, c3, wa(wcel(c2, universe), w0), wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c2))))
  3impia(wa(wcel(c2, universe), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  syl5(wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cdif(universe, csn(c2))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wne(c1, c2))
  eldifsni(c1, universe, c2)
  necon1ad(c1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  expr(wa(wcel(c2, universe), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(c1, c2))
  sylan2br(wa(wcel(c2, universe), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3))), wceq(c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3)))
  eldif(cv(s0), c0, c3)
  adantll(wcel(c2, universe), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3)), wceq(c1, c2))
  a1d(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), c3))
  syl6eqss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), c3, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wceq(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe), wcel(c2, universe))))
  intnand(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  id(wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  supp0prc(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2)
  0ss(c3)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c2, universe), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm suppss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2)‚äÜ c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i((w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2)‚äÜ c3), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ex(c2 ‚àà ùïå, w0, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2)‚äÜ c3)
  eqsstrd(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2), c3, { s0 ‚àà c0 | c1 ‚àà(ùïå \ { c2 })}, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß w0))
  mptsuppdifd(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), c2, c0, c1, c4, universe, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß w0))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  adantl(c2 ‚àà ùïå, w0, c0 ‚àà c4)
  simpl(c2 ‚àà ùïå, w0)
  rabssdv(s0, c0, c3, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß w0), c1 ‚àà(ùïå \ { c2 }))
  3impia((c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß w0), s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà(ùïå \ { c2 }), s0 ‚àà c3)
  syl5(((c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß w0)‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), c1 ‚àà(ùïå \ { c2 }), s0 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚â† c2)
  eldifsni(c1, universe, c2)
  necon1ad(c1, c2, ((c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß w0)‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), s0 ‚àà c3)
  expr((c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß w0), s0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c3, c1 = c2)
  sylan2br((c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß w0), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c3), c1 = c2, s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3))
  eldif(s0, c0, c3)
  adantll(c2 ‚àà ùïå, w0, s0 ‚àà(c0 \ c3), c1 = c2)
  a1d(¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå, w0, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2)‚äÜ c3)
  syl6eqss(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2), c3, emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl(¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2)= ‚àÖ, ¬¨((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà ùïå ‚àß c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  intnand(¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  id(¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  supp0prc((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), c2)
  0ss(c3)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c2 ‚àà ùïå, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: suppsssn
blocks.content: Show that the support of a function is a subset of a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppsssn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), csupp, c2), csn(c3)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  suppss2(s0, c0, c1, c2, csn(c3), c4, w0)
  sylan2b(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(c3))), wceq(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), c3)))
  eldifsn(cv(s0), c0, c3)
  3expb(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c1, c2))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm suppsssn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)[supp]c2)‚äÜ { c3 })
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚â† c3)‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  suppss2(s0, c0, c1, c2, { c3 }, c4, w0)
  sylan2b(w0, s0 ‚àà(c0 \ { c3 }), c1 = c2, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚â† c3))
  eldifsn(s0, c0, c3)
  3expb(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, s0 ‚â† c3, c1 = c2)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
}

blocks.name: suppssfv
blocks.content: Formula building theorem for support restriction, on a function which preserves zero. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppssfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), csupp, c3), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), csupp, c5), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, c5), c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c7))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), csupp, c3), c4)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), csupp, c3), c4))
  sstrd(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), csupp, c3), c4, co(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), csupp, c5), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0))
  3sstr4d(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), csupp, c3), co(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), csupp, c5), crab(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cdif(universe, csn(c3)))), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c2, cdif(universe, csn(c5)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0))
  ss2rabdv(s0, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wcel(c2, cdif(universe, csn(c5))))
  syl5(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cdif(universe, csn(c3))), wcel(c2, cdif(universe, csn(c5))), wne(cfv(c1, c2), c3))
  eldifsni(cfv(c1, c2), universe, c3)
  ex(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(cfv(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c2, cdif(universe, csn(c5))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(cfv(c1, c2), c3)), wcel(c2, cdif(universe, csn(c5))), wcel(c2, universe), wne(c2, c5))
  ad4ant23(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cfv(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c2, universe))
  elexd(c2, c6, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  imp(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(cfv(c1, c2), c3), wne(c2, c5))
  ad2antlr(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wne(cfv(c1, c2), c3), wne(c2, c5)))
  necon3d(cfv(c1, c2), c3, c2, c5, w0)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(c2, c5), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), c3), wceq(cfv(c1, c5), c3))
  fveqeq2(c2, c5, c1, c3)
  eldifsn(c2, universe, c5)
  mptsuppdifd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), c3, c0, cfv(c1, c2), universe, universe, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe), w0)
  mptsuppdifd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c5, c0, c2, universe, c7, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  simpll(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe), w0)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0, wcel(c5, c7))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), csupp, c5), c4))
  a1d(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))), w0, wss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), csupp, c3), c4))
  syl6eqss(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), csupp, c3), c4, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))))
  sylnbi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), csupp, c3), emptycls), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), universe))
  impbii(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), universe))
  mptexg(s0, c0, universe, cfv(c1, c2))
  syl5eqelr(c0, universe, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), universe))
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2))), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(c1, c2), universe)))
  rgenw(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(c1, c2), universe))
  fvex(c1, c2)
  dmmptg(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2), universe)
  dmexg(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), universe)
  supp0prc(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1, c2)), c3)
  0ss(c4)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm suppssfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))[supp]c3)‚äÜ c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)[supp]c5)‚äÜ c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 ` c5)= c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i((w0 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))[supp]c3)‚äÜ c4), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå))
  ex((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), w0, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))[supp]c3)‚äÜ c4)
  sstrd(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))[supp]c3), c4, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)[supp]c5), ((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0))
  3sstr4d(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))[supp]c3), ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)[supp]c5), { s0 ‚àà c0 |(c1 ` c2)‚àà(ùïå \ { c3 })}, { s0 ‚àà c0 | c2 ‚àà(ùïå \ { c5 })}, ((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0))
  ss2rabdv(s0, c0, ((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0), (c1 ` c2)‚àà(ùïå \ { c3 }), c2 ‚àà(ùïå \ { c5 }))
  syl5((((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0)‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), (c1 ` c2)‚àà(ùïå \ { c3 }), c2 ‚àà(ùïå \ { c5 }), (c1 ` c2)‚â† c3)
  eldifsni((c1 ` c2), universe, c3)
  ex((((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0)‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), (c1 ` c2)‚â† c3, c2 ‚àà(ùïå \ { c5 }))
  sylanbrc(((((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0)‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚àß(c1 ` c2)‚â† c3), c2 ‚àà(ùïå \ { c5 }), c2 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚â† c5)
  ad4ant23((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), w0, s0 ‚àà c0, (c1 ` c2)‚â† c3, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elexd(c2, c6, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  imp((((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0)‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), (c1 ` c2)‚â† c3, c2 ‚â† c5)
  ad2antlr((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), w0, s0 ‚àà c0, ((c1 ` c2)‚â† c3 ‚Üí c2 ‚â† c5))
  necon3d((c1 ` c2), c3, c2, c5, w0)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, c2 = c5, (c1 ` c2)= c3, (c1 ` c5)= c3)
  fveqeq2(c2, c5, c1, c3)
  eldifsn(c2, universe, c5)
  mptsuppdifd(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2)), c3, c0, (c1 ` c2), universe, universe, ((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2)))
  simplr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå, w0)
  mptsuppdifd(s0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2), c5, c0, c2, universe, c7, ((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå)‚àß w0))

  simpll(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå, w0)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), w0, c5 ‚àà c7)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), w0, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)[supp]c5)‚äÜ c4)
  a1d(¬¨(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), w0, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))[supp]c3)‚äÜ c4)
  syl6eqss(((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))[supp]c3), c4, emptycls, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå))

  anbi1i(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))‚àà ùïå)
  impbii(c0 ‚àà ùïå, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))‚àà ùïå)
  mptexg(s0, c0, universe, (c1 ` c2))
  syl5eqelr(c0, universe, dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2))‚àà ùïå)
  ax-mp(dom((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2)))= c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` c2)‚àà ùïå))
  rgenw(s0, c0, (c1 ` c2)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(c1, c2)
  dmmptg(s0, c0, (c1 ` c2), universe)
  dmexg((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2)), universe)
  supp0prc((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1 ` c2)), c3)
  0ss(c4)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c3 ‚àà ùïå), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)

blocks.name: suppofss1d
blocks.content: Condition for the support of a function operation to be a subset of the support of the left function term. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm suppofss1d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), csupp, c3), co(c0, csupp, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c4, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6)), wceq(co(c3, c1, cv(s0)), c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wss(co(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), csupp, c3), co(c0, csupp, c3))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  mpd(w0, wss(co(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), csupp, c3), co(c0, csupp, c3)), wral(hs0, c4, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), c3))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c4, w0, wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), c3)))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), c3))
  3eqtrd(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), c3, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), co(c3, c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3)))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  ofval(cv(hs0), c4, c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c4, c4, c5, c5, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  oveq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3))

blocks.origin:
thm supp0cosupp0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  ancomd(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, universe))
  anim2i(wcel(c4, universe), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, c1))
